project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file and calculates the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement calculation of mean for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the implemented calculations
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
